replies.msg: 點辛苦法

My friend Mark works as an accounting manager in a hospital in central. If he takes the job in Big 4 he'll be five thousand dollars a month better off now but he's still better off than he was two years ago when he was working beneath everybody else in the department. He thinks a junior accountant position is beneath him. If he hadn't taken the CPA exam two years ago he wouldn't be working as a manager now. If he had pursued a career in sales rather than accounting his salary would be much lower. If it wasn't for his uncle's referral his career wouldn't take off now and he wouldn't.start earning a lot of money. He's been having a crush on this girl named Jo for eight years but Jo has a boyfriend. His friend said "I don't blame you for fancying her. She's quite attractive" But he's beginning to realise he has no place in her scheme of things. He's just being a doormat so I told him to forget her. She's just not worth it. His mother said "you'll be better off without her" His aunt too said "you'd be better off without her" He's a sci-fi fan. He said "if starships really would exist I would quit my job and spend the rest of my life roaming the universe" Recently his sister married her childhood sweetheart. Her father felt she was marrying beneath her though. Her uncle too feels her husband is beneath her. She enjoys socializing with the better off. Last month he was away on a business trip to hokkaido. After his trip I said "if you should travel there again can you get me a pack of white lover cookies please?" Mark is a computer expert. His cousin has to write a report which is due on Tuesday but she's having problems with her computer. If mark would go and fix her computer she'll be so thankful for his help. She also has exams next Monday so she's better off revising at home over the weekend. Mark is a kickboxing fan. His favourite fighter Dan has recently won his retirement fight. He's deeply grateful to his coaches and thankful that he has got a job as a colour commentator after he retired from the sport. All the fans want to see Fred versus randy. If Fred will sign a deal with the organisation Dana will make the fight happen. When randy was reading the terms and conditions of the contract dana's assistant said "if you would just sign here please" Mark's brother is a concierge in a hotel. I said "if it'll make you happy I'll come to stay for a night as company for you while your colleagues are away" Mark threw a party last sunday. As many of us wanted to watch the news I asked "if I could turn the television on please" He then said "sure. if you would switch yo the news channel." By the end of the next century scientists will have invented starships. As I'm fascinated by the science of starships I'm gonna ask physicist dr. cho about it. I'm gonna wait for him outside the lecture room. He'll have finished his lecture. I thought about phoning him at five past two but my friend said "don't phone him now. He won't have finished his lecture yet" It's true that he wouldn't have finished teaching yet" I saw joey live twice with my friends at the Hong kong coliseum which was marvelous and unforgettable. The first time I saw her concert we were late. I remember I said "look at the time. The concert will have begun" It was ten to nine. The concert would've started by then. It was a worthwhile concert that was compelling enough to see again.

轉完發現都係一樣handle唔到
人工仲要低一大截

我同你掉轉, 讀IT但想轉行。
真心唔好因為諗著做IT 就唔洗對人
其實寫program 定係做Support, consultant, IT sales
全部都要對人對客對manager對同事
開會講大家IT人講既野好似火星文咁
閪客又多，對住離地唔識IT 老細又要好高超溝請能力去cater佢地
識IT既manager 都可以好離地

replies.msg: 我都想知
咩科？
做廢工會成個廢左
小弟當年入行都一舊飯咁，頭兩年日日比人話。挨挨吓咁就三年senior線以上拎埋約滿酬金。嚟緊轉Officer做Nursing嘢返九五工。想講開頭乜都唔識做得慢一定比人小，但重點係接納自己仲jun同諗點樣做得更好，挨夠三年再諗諗方向都唔遲。始終醫院前線訓練到你好多嘢，所謂浸過咸水之後去邊都請。共勉之
